ygData.subject: RE: negativity
ygData.msgSnippet: Sheesh Harmonic, first swearing and namecalling, and now what sound like threats? What s next?  You going to tell your mom?  ;) Elwyn ... From: Ryan Honeyman
ygData.messageBody:
Sheesh Harmonic, first swearing and namecalling, and now what sound like
threats?
What's next? You going to tell your mom? ;)


Elwyn

-----Original Message-----
From: Ryan Honeyman [mailto:honeyman@...]
Sent: Friday, February 04, 2000 9:40 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] negativity


From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>


Steelwolf,

If you feel the need to post my private messages to you on this list
again (and make it look like I posted it to the list itself, instead
of where it really went, which was your personal mailbox), I am going
to suggest you be removed from the list.

That is one thing I cannot tolerate. I would be much more careful
in the future for your own benefit. Much more careful...

Harmonic.
